title: Linux cksum Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the cksum command in Linux, learn how to calculate checksums for files, and verify file integrity using practical examples.

meta.title: Linux cksum Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the cksum command in Linux, learn how to calculate checksums for files, and verify file integrity using practical examples.
meta.keywords: linux, cksum, checksum, file integrity, file operations, command line

verify.name: Verify cksum command usage
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can run the `cksum` command on a file and that the output is displayed correctly.

verify.name: Verify checksum calculation
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly calculate the checksum of the `sample.txt` file using the `cksum` command.

verify.name: Verify file integrity using cksum
verify.hint: Please ensure that you can correctly verify the integrity of a file by comparing the checksum before and after modifying the file.
